name: Survival To The End
description:
-Survival to the end is a 2D zombie survival game.

This is a demo release to the public so I can obtain feedback on my game and I can use it to help make my game better. This game is created in construct 2 and aseprite. 2 new maps will be in development see devlog for info.

 I ask you to follow my twitter and join my discord for updates on "survival to the end" and updates in general.

This is a demo for feedback on my game

(Which is very appreciated)

- Full release will be in the next 1 to 2 months 

-The planned price will be $3.00 or $4.00

Controls:

A: Left

D: Right

Left Mouse Click: Shoot
